duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage in business requirements gathering and analysis for ServiceNow platform implementations.
Utilize analytical and problem-solving skills to configure and optimize ServiceNow for ITSM processes.
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and manage requirements, and communicate technical concepts effectively.
Design and map workflows and processes to align with ServiceNow capabilities, and drive process improvement initiatives.
Create detailed functional and technical specifications, business process documentation, and use cases for ServiceNow projects.
Implement and manage configuration and customization of ServiceNow, and ensure adherence to Change Management best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration or relevant field. ServiceNow certification (CSA & SAFE Scrum Master) preferred.
